item.description:
Waterfire is an exhibit in Providence that is like no other. Fires are lit all along the city's riverways. Also featured are performers, such as musicians and mimes. The lighting is at 8:30 p.m. For more details go to waterfire.org
My thinking is this: Let's meet at the Providence Place Mall. Go 146 south into Rhode Island until it merges with 95 South. Take exit 22B off 95 South and follow signs to mall. I don't want to arrange a dinner at a restaurant in the Providence area, because I know from past experience how mobbed the restaurants are down there. So, I think we should just eat on our own before leaving, or grab a bite at one of the many vendors selling food at waterfire.
item.name: Waterfire in Providence
